item.description: I know nothing about being an organizer, but would hate to see this meet up group disappear. I just want to get to know others that are interested in the book club and come up with a list of books that they would like to share with others. Just a meet and greet to ge to know the members of the meet up group and get the group started.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a black note book with me!
item.why: What is life if not inspiring and expansive! Get to know more about others and yourself through literature!

group.name: The Hartford Area Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: Introductions
